entry.def: Something, especially hair, that is gingery is slightly ginger in colour.

means.word_mean: 1. having a piquant burning taste of spices or peppers;
2. (used especially of hair or fur) having a bright orange-brown color;

sentences.sentence: "a man with gingery hair and bright blue eyes"
